q: Budget deficit' Lawyers for Mr Michael Gove had argued his decisions were not made lightly and were not open to legal challenge. In written statements put before the court, they said the coalition had inherited the largest budget deficit in peacetime history, and spending cuts had had to be made "quickly and significantly". The axing of the scheme in July last year meant that at least 700 school rebuilds in England would not be going ahead

. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. The U.S. and other countries charge that China keeps its currency artificially low to maintain an export advantage. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. It's an interesting thing to be judged as well as the competitor because when you lose an artist, you know part of you has lost as well. It really does become incredibly competitive between the judges... in a way they're more competitive than the artists because we don't pretend to like each other. Sergio Marchionne , the chief executive of both Chrysler and Fiat, said that retooling the product lineup had positioned Chrysler to start making money again. It can be safely said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, He said the company would increase revenues this year to$ 55 billion and achieve net income of$ 200 million to$ 500 million.
